mapper.select: select a.ecode,a.style as equipment_style,a.status as equipment_status,a.prod_id, a.last_workunit_id as workunit_id, a.last_task_id as task_id, a.last_installIn_id as installIn_id, b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name ,f.store_id as str_out_id,g.name as str_out_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_equipment_store f on a.ecode=f.ecode inner join ems_store g on f.store_id=g.id where a.ecode=#{ecode} and f.store_id=#{store_id}

select a.*,b.name as subtype_name,c.name as prod_name,c.spec as prod_spec,d.name as brand_name,e.name as supplier_name from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipmentsubtype b on a.subtype_id=b.id inner join ems_equipmentprod c on a.prod_id=c.id inner join ems_brand d on a.brand_id=d.id inner join ems_supplier e on a.supplier_id=e.id inner join ems_equipment_store f on a.ecode=f.ecode where f.store_id=#{store_id} and a.status='wait_for_repair'

select a.ecode,a.prod_id, a.last_workunit_id as workunit_id, a.last_task_id as task_id, a.last_installIn_id as installIn_id, f.store_id as str_out_id from ems_equipment a inner join ems_equipment_store f on a.ecode=f.ecode where f.store_id=#{store_id} and a.status='wait_for_repair'
